committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to eliminate the buffer zone established in connection with the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Eliminates the inland buffer zone established to preserve the shoreline, lakes, watersheds, and streams and provide for the fullest economic utilization of renewable resources with respect to the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore in Michigan.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate the buffer zone established in connection with the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, and for other purposes.
